parameters.name: api.security.whitelist
parameters.description: api endpoint for private server to server whitelist

parameters.name: api.security.blacklist
parameters.description: api endpoint for public to server blacklist

parameters.name: api.security.ratelimit.requests
parameters.description: rate limiter max requests in x seconds defined by api.security.ratelimit.lifetime.secs

parameters.name: api.security.ratelimit.lifetime.secs
parameters.description: rate limiter api.security.ratelimit.requests in x seconds

parameters.name: token.refresh.enforce.valid.ip
parameters.description: check the request headers ip against the ip used to create the users last refresh token. If true and no match then token is invalidated

parameters.name: token.service.secret
parameters.description: service token secret key. Used for server to server authentication

parameters.name: token.service.expires
parameters.description: service token lifetime in minutes. 0 never expire

parameters.name: token.service.valid.api.keys
parameters.description: list of valid api keys trusted by auth

parameters.name: token.service.auth.api.key
parameters.description: api key of the auth server
